channel.title: gem on Seven steps
channel.description: Recent content in gem on Seven steps

item.title: install the mysql gem on Ubuntu
item.description: $ sudo apt-get install libmysqlclient15-dev $ sudo gem install mysql Easy! But .. gotta know it.

item.title: Installing the mysql gem on OSX
item.description: Taken straight from this blog in a terminal.. First do a 'locate mysql_config' and then replace the path in the following command with where that file is. $ sudo gem install mysql -- --with-mysql-config=/usr/local/mysql/bin/mysql_config Building native extensions. This could take a while... Successfully installed mysql-2.7 1 gem installed
